author: FRANCES D'EMILIO
description: VATICAN CITY (AP) — In a surprise announcement Sunday, Pope Francis named new cardinals for Spain, El Salvador and three countries where Catholics are a tiny minority: Mali, Laos and Sweden. "Their origin, from different parts of the world, manifests the universality of the Church spread out all over the Earth," Francis said, speaking from the window of the Apostolic Palace to thousands of faithful in St. Peter's Square.
title: Pope names cardinals for Laos, Mali, Sweden, Spain, Salvador

author: Alle Beiträge von dpa  anzeigen.
description: Der neue französische Staatschef Macron fordert mehr Engagement von Deutschland und Europa im Anti-Terror-Kampf in Mali. Er habe bereits zu Wochenbeginn mit Kanzlerin Angela Merkel in Berlin darüber gesprochen.
title: Anti-Terror-Kampf in Mali: Macron fordert mehr Einsatz von Deutschland und Europa

author: Francis D'Emilio / AP
description: For Spain, El Salvador, Mali, Laos and Sweden
title: Pope Francis Announces 5 New Cardinals Who Show 'Universality of the Church'
